animeDescription: An elite police crime fighting team is formed using convicted criminals. Using their first hand knowledge of the criminal mindset, the Wild 7 are first sent after a gang of Bank robbers. Then in Wild Biker Knights they are sent after a huge crime syndicate that has many high powered government officials in its deep pockets.(Source: ANN)
animeVoices: ['Seki, Toshihiko', 'Naya, Rokurou', 'Morikawa, Toshiyuki', 'Yanaka, Hiroshi', 'Orikasa, Ai', 'Terada, Minori', 'Yamadera, Kouichi', 'Anzai, Masahiro', 'Genda, Tesshou', 'Kobayashi, Kiyoshi']
